thread.title: Ground News - Prison bus trips offer ‘lifeline’ for kids and incarcerated moms
thread.title_full: Ground News - Prison bus trips offer ‘lifeline’ for kids and incarcerated moms

author: Chicago Sun Times
title: Ground News - Prison bus trips offer ‘lifeline’ for kids and incarcerated moms
text:
Summary by Chicago Sun Times About three dozen children and family members travel on a chartered bus to Logan Correctional Center. The trip is organized by the Reunification Ride program, which offers free trips for kids to visit their mothers and loved ones at the prison in Lincoln, Illinois.Manuel Martinez / WBEZ It’s just after 7 a.m. on a recent Saturday morning, and 9-year-old Caydrian has already had a long day.“So first, I wake up at three in the morning, and then I… Share menu More
